name: calamarble-fb-webhook-verify
description: Function to handle Facebook Messenger Platform webhooks token verification

scripts-info.test:dev: Run tests with the dev environment
scripts-info.test: Run tests with the ES5 lib
scripts-info.zip:lambda: Create a zip file with the necessary files to be used in AWS Lambda
scripts-info.ppp: Increases package version patch part and publish to npm and git.

scripts.preppp: npm run build && npm run cp:npm
scripts.ppp: npm version patch && git push && git push --tags && npm publish dist/npm

author: Fabricio C Zuardi
